# <a name="advanced-outlookcom-security-for-microsoft-365-subscribers"></a><span data-ttu-id="a5596-102">Advanced Outlook.com Security za Microsoft 365 pretplatnike</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-102">Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a5596-103">Svi Outlook.com korisnici imaju koristi od bezvredne i filtriranja malvera.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-103">All Outlook.com users benefit from spam and malware filtering.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a5596-104">Za Office 365 Home and Office 365 personal pretplatnika, Outlook.com obavlja dodatnu projekciju priloga i veza u porukama koje primate.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-104">For Office 365 Home and Office 365 Personal subscribers, Outlook.com performs extra screening of attachments and links in messages you receive.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a5596-105">Da biste saznali više, pročitajte [napredne Outlook.com Security za Microsoft 365 pretplatnike](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-105">To learn more, read [Advanced Outlook.com security for Microsoft 365 subscribers](https://support.office.com/article/882d2243-eab9-4545-a58a-b36fee4a46e2?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="a5596-106">Da biste uključili ili isključili bezbedne veze, idite na [Postavke vrhunskog kvaliteta](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-106">To turn on or turn off Safe Links, go to your [Premium Security settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/premium/security) (</span></span><img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="a5596-107">**Postavke**  >  **Premium**  >  **Bezbednost**).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a5596-107">**Settings** > **Premium** > **Security**).</span></span>
